鞁字的基本解释

鞁
bèi
古代套车用的器具。
同“鞴”。

鞁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》平義切，去寘，並。］
(1)古代对马具的总称。
(2)备驾；配置马具。

鞁字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞁； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1386第33
【唐韻】平祕切【集韻】平義切，?音髲。【說文】車駕具也。【廣韻】裝束鞁馬。【晉語】鐵之戰，郵無正御，曰：吾兩鞁將絕，吾能止之。【註】鞁，平義切。靷也。　又【玉篇】皮彼切，音被。又【集韻】披義切，音帔。義?同。

Basic explanation of words
Gang
bèi
Equipment used in ancient sets of cars.
Same as "Yin".
Gang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Guangyun" cut righteously, go to place, and merge. ]
(1) The general term for ancient harnesses.
(2) Prepare for driving; configure harness.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞁; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1386 Page 33
[Tang Yun] Ping Secret Cut [Ji Yun] Ping Yi cut,? Sound. 【Said the text】Car driving equipment also. [Guang Yun] Dress up a horse. [Jin dialect] The battle of iron, there is no righteous imperial postage, saying: My two will die, I can stop it. [Note] Dang, cut flatly. Kuquat also.　[Jade Chapter] Pi Peiqi, sound quilt. Also 【Jiyun】Phi Yi cut, sound. Righteous? Same.
